text:
Could you please change private members of PropertyFile task to protected? This 
will allow to users to extends and enhance task functionality without bothering 
authors. For example: I would like to change writeFile() of PropertyFile task 
to "not escape" characters with "\". I dont want to copy&paste your code and 
add my stuf, but just change writeFile() and have access to some private 
methods and members. Please be kind! :)


thanks
creator: miha@softhome.net
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
I feel your pain, but dont want to make the changes

1. that backslash escaping? It's in the property file spec.

2. if we made the private stuff protected, we would have to freeze the
implementation indefinately; the members would have become part of the public
API of ant. 

3. why do you need to filter out the escapes? Maybe there is another solution,
perhaps one of the new FilterReaders (a characterstripper reader would be a nice
generic filter)
